text: "Better Days" is a 1992 song by Bruce Springsteen. It is the leading single from his 10th studio album Lucky Town. It went to number 2 on the Billboard Mainstream Rock chart, number 4 in Italy, number 16 in the United States, number 23 in Sweden, number 25 in Ireland and number 28 in Belgium. == Track listings == * 7-inch single # Better Days – 4:08 # Tougher Than the Rest (Live from L.A. Sports Arena April 27, 1988) – 6:30 * CD single # Better Days – 4:08 # Tougher Than the Rest (Live) – 6:30 # Part Man, Part Monkey – 4:29 Category:1992 songs Category:Bruce Springsteen songs
title: Better Days (Bruce Springsteen song)
